00042 /* @{ */

00229 void IMG_ycbcr422pl_to_rgb565
00230 (
00231     const short                   coeff[5],  /* Matrix coefficients.          */
00232     const unsigned char *restrict y_data,    /* Luminence data        (Y')    */
00233     const unsigned char *restrict cb_data,   /* Blue color-difference (B'-Y') */
00234     const unsigned char *restrict cr_data,   /* Red color-difference  (R'-Y') */
00235     unsigned short      *restrict rgb_data,  /* RGB 5:6:5 packed pixel output */
00236     unsigned                      num_pixels /* # of luma pixels to process.  */
00237 );
